website_summaries.verdict: A dual-purpose retinol cream by a popular name in skin care that has developed a fan base for its smoothing and moisturizing formula.
pros: Formulated with retinol and hyaluronic acid, ingredients known to smooth and moisturize
Has silky feel and light scent
Some users rave about smoother, brighter skin after just a few applications
cons: A few customers complain that it feels a bit "heavy" on the face
Price is on the high side for a relatively small jar

customer_reviews.title: ... wrinkles around my mouth that are deep and I hate. I fidn’t Think anything would help
customer_reviews.text: I am seeing some improvement on heavy wrinkles around my mouth that are deep and I hate. I didn’t think anything would help, but this is. However, it is pretty hard on your skin (stinging and flaking) so be sure to follow the instructions on beginning use—only every other day at first.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Lin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference in the fine lines on my face within a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: and so far it has been great at keeping my face hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Roc Retinol Correxion for 3 weeks now, and so far it has been great at keeping my face hydrated. I have noticed some fine lines are less noticeable as well as crows feet. Because I have not used it long term as of yet, the final results are not in! Based on the first three weeks however, I am confident that the continued use will produce the results promised.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Waldrup

customer_reviews.title: The Smell is Strong
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I used this on my hands and not my face as the smell is overbearing. I wish I could take it back to the store but I got it on Amazon so I'm stuck with a product I won't be able to use. This was my first morning trying it so I do not know if long term use will help everybody. I do know even with washing my hands the stench of this product is still on my hands and I cannot deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great when paired with the daily moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Great when paired with the daily moisturizer! I can see a difference in my skin from just a month of use. Brighter, more even toned. More hydrated. Very happy with ROC. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Pruit

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed
customer_reviews.text: I thought when I got the product that the plastic wrap seemed a little off or loose. Then when I opened the jar, the silver seal that I should have had to pull off was completely off and stuck inside the top of the lid. I'm not sure how that happens but it makes me think this was opened once already. Also, the perfume smell is very heavy and unappealing.
customer_reviews.author: V. Turner

customer_reviews.title: No difference except for redness - my skin is too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a few weeks now and I haven't really noticed a difference. The only thing that did happen is that my nose got red and sore around the edges, which is what happened when I used another product that had a lot of retinol in it. So I just stopped using it two days ago. I think I'll be trying to find another product and won't be purchasing it again. It might work great for someone else to use, but my skin was too sensitive to it and again, I never looked in the mirror and thought "wow, it really helped those fine lines" - hope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This didn’t work for me - burn, burn, burn!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just me, but this product truly burned my skin. I have never needed to use skin products deemed only for sensitive skin in the past, but the effects of this lingered for days. I deeply regretted purchasing this. The effects have worn off, thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Shea

customer_reviews.title: Scent is overpowering, can’t use it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like this at all! Very chemically smell...not sure about the results as I can’t get past the overly perfumes chemical smell. My husband doesn’t like to kiss me good night if I have this cream on.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Used a whole jar
customer_reviews.text: This product seems good as it contain retinal, a key ingredient to wrinkle prevention and it also has moisturizers. However, I've used a whole jar now and have not noticed any difference in my skins. I have very fine wrinkles around my eyes and in between the eye browns (the eleven!) I thought these cream will help but I have not seen any progress yet. Maybe another jar will do the trick?
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Funky smell and packaging suspect
customer_reviews.text: This product is very suspect as to whether it is the real deal. The packaging seemed odd with the bottom of the container being stuck and a necessary label clearly missing. When I opened it, the seal was up inside the lid and not attached, the product looked like something that was very old, and the smell is horrible. I find it hard to believe this is what it is really supposed to smell like. I am going to try and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty K

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any personal problems with this product. Although, it contains a harmful ingredient (possibly more) called “Phenoxyethanol”. Discarded the product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: koko

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is amazing. I’m a 66 yr old gal and have tried a lot of products. A little goes along way. It’s hydrated my skin to the point of my wrinkles seem less obvious. My skin stays soft and it’s gotten rid of all the dry patches. I even put it over my lips when applying it and made a huge difference there as well. Bought it here on Amazon. Was less expensive that target and shipped free to prime. Got it the next day. 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: FrannyAz

customer_reviews.title: Very good for reducing age/sun spots
customer_reviews.text: So, it's important to follow the directions for this product, because it really works. If you use too much or apply too often, it will burn. I experienced slight burning with use, but followed the directions and saw significant difference in only a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Joy

customer_reviews.title: Causes irritation around eyes
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product as it has caused burning and redness around my eyes. I don't have particularly sensitive skin either.
customer_reviews.author: t sudduth

customer_reviews.title: Good Housekeeping rated this 2 golden stars!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cream and can't wait for results!
customer_reviews.author: Botkin

customer_reviews.title: UPSET OVER PRODUCT PACKAGING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream but will never purchase it again because my 73 year old weak hands were aching by the time I finally got the container unstuck from the packaging. There was a very large glob of EXTREMELY STRONG adhesive on the bottom of jar that made it more than difficult to remove from package in order to use product. I am not a satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I used the whole jar before writing my review. The first few times it gave me a huge rash and made my face really dry, I thought maybe my skin wasn’t used to retinol or the other ingredients. I kept using it and a couple weeks later, it was fine. No more rashes but for a moisturizer, it does the opposite and dry out your skin which make my forehead and laugh lines more visible. I definitely won’t be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it says it will do and non- comedogenic!
customer_reviews.text: This Roc product does everything it promises, my skin looks so much more radiant and wrinkle-reduced or wrinkle-free AND the product is non-oily and non-comedogenic! Facial skin heaven in a jar... Roc had always been my default in facial care, until I would be seduced by some new fad or miracle product, only to return to Roc. I will not be seduced away from this hydrating cream-light but substantial, goes on easily, minimal but pleasant fragrance, non-greasy- which delivers what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: gta2ndlf

customer_reviews.title: Overall would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 23 so I can’t talk for the wrinkle help. But I wanted a retinol hydronic acid mix for prevention of wrinkles. Follow directions, it does burn if using too often and do not put it too close to your eyes!! It burns. Smell is very perfumey grandma lotion but I don’t mind. It doesn’t smell once it’s on. Jar lasts a while. Doesn’t make my face breakout and I normally breakout from nearly all lotions. Jar is really heavy and glass which I love!!
customer_reviews.author: C & O

customer_reviews.title: A+++ for product, packaging, delivery,,,it is gold!
customer_reviews.text: A+++ for all aspects, product, packaging, delivery,etc... Roc Retinol is an amazing line and this product is exceptional, if u have sensitive skin I would advise using one product first and then adding additional Roc products, (I started with the night time deep wrinkle correction, I was blown away by the immediate results) and now added 5 more Roc products- love them all!!! Definitely will be using these as long as I can! Shipping was great thank and faster than I expected considering I moved overseas 8 years ago Thank you so much for an awesome Amazon experience!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katerina K

customer_reviews.title: This product really works.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that every time I order this product the box seems to be tampered with. The seal on the bottom of the box is broken. The product on the other hand seems to be working well for me. A lot of my fine lines are disappearing and the deeper lines seem to be softening. When you first start using Roc, you will feel a little tingling discomfort. I suggest using a regular moisturizer every other day until your skin adjusts. Like I said before, the product has been tampered with the three times that I ordered it but the product is working on my 45 year old skin, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A. LeMay

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have softened forehead wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: It feels great the minute it is applied. The forehead wrinkles seem markedly softer and cheek area seems better, too. So far I have not noticed any change in those awful eye bags. Will keep with it and hope for more progress. Be sure to apply sunscreen if you are going outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jar it does make my skin feel very hydrated and it also helped up in brightening up the skin as well will update if it worked for any lines
customer_reviews.author: A. Qamar

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my skin
customer_reviews.text: Used this product once and it burned my skin. Wish I had read the reviews. Do not buy this product! I normally do not have sensitive skin but I hope this does not take a month to clear up as others have said..
customer_reviews.author: Lori J.

customer_reviews.title: This creme works
customer_reviews.text: This pricy truly works! Roc has always been a name you could trust without breaking the bank. My skin is softer,lines are fainter and I think it is fading sun spots. It saddens your face and stings a tiny bit for about 10 secs. This cream is worth a try. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Baird

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm noticing wonderful results with this. It provides such great moisturizing and keeps my skin soft and to be honest I am noticing more evenness in my skin tone. It's almost like I'm noticing the slight sunspots I have fading and blending in more. The other day when I was putting on moisturizer I actually paused and looked in the mirror because I was kind of taken aback by the results and was very pleased! It definitely gives me a little bit of a glow too. Wonderful moisturizer! I feel like it's great for evening out skin tone, keeping skin soft, and giving one a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Magic Eraser
customer_reviews.text: Bought two jars. Gave one to my 82 year young husband. WOW! His face and neck look great! I can tell a huge difference in both of us! Was hesitant about ordering this online. Very happy with this product. Ordering more and will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Francois

customer_reviews.title: deep moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: great at moisturizing but not so sure its done much for the wrinkle lines after 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer yet
customer_reviews.text: I have used many hydrating moisturizers over the years and spent lots of money and I must say that this product made a difference in the first 30 days. It truly lasts all day and night, l love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: My age spots are barely visible now . This product actually works !!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I have tried every product out there. Finally one that works. I could actually see a difference and feel a tingling sensation the first day. I'm not kidding. My age spots are barely visible now. This is the best product I've ever used. I also bought the eye cream. Same results. Every woman out there needs to try this.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: At Amazon I got my Roc products for less and free shipping
customer_reviews.text: It works in one week you can see your skin brighter and tighter. I’m 70 years old and since I started using ROC my face feels and looks 10 years younger.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell but not my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: The scent is heavily performed and the consistency is a little more watery than creamy. Its too soon to tell, but I definitely think it would be difficult for sensitive skin. I think I will go back to Retin-A and euracin q10 instead.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The vendor shipped the product quickly and arrived in good condition. The product itself is disappointing. I do not have sensitive skin nor do I have adult acne. I have been using this product for almost 2 months now, and I have seen no improvement in skin texture or being more moisturized. The product has a very chemically smell. My cheeks turn red after using it and within an hour I have a small amount of acne breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Smith

customer_reviews.title: This Creme Works!
customer_reviews.text: This creme works! I have been using it for about 2 months and the lines around my mouth are noticeably diminished.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Crooks

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for under makeup for normal to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Even when applied lightly, it was too tacky to be applied before makeup. After giving plenty of time to absorb, still had to use an oil sheet to remove the tackiness so I could try to apply makeup. The product was so thick some sat on top of my skin. Great for moisture! But if you have normal to lightly dry skin, not a good choice if you wear makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Works well, nice to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Leaves skin softer the next day when used at night, seems to be helping smooth my wrinkles and fade my brown spots a bit, as much as any of these do. Moisturizes better than some competitors. Nice aroma, not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: JudyK45

customer_reviews.title: Why is this scented???
customer_reviews.text: As the winter was starting to really dry out my skin, I was looking for a new product to really kick in the moisture. After reading reviews, I chose this. I hate it. The scent is horrible and storing. NO FACIAL MOISTURIZER SHOULD BE SCENTED!! The scented lotion burned my poor sensitive skin. CeraVe saved my skin after this product almost destroyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this a handful of times and already love the way it makes my skin feel and look. I only use it at night, as it is recommended in conjunction with SPF for daytime use. I read in an article somewhere that of all the overpriced skin care out there, this was voted the best so I gave it a shot and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This was hydrating but it was not for my skin. It felt great when putting it on but it made me feel itchy probably because of what was in it. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You can see a difference.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of using this face cream I had 3 people tell me my complexion was beautiful. These were people that I had never met before! It is a nice, heavier cream that feels good on my extra dry skin. Add me to the fan list!
customer_reviews.author: E. Grugin

customer_reviews.title: To ensure it works as stated
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product because of hydrating your face it dry’s out my skin and as the day progresses so will the drying out the skin get worse. Not worth the price and I bought a very inferior product that does not match any of the hype over it
customer_reviews.author: Dale petko

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Way too harsh for a daily moisturizer, and no payoff for the intense feeling of chemical burns. I use it before bed about 2x a week as part of my skincare routine because I do not want it to go to waste, but there are products that are better. I would recommend the RoC eye retinol for night time and something with HA for daily use. This is too harsh.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It made my face look younger and it is doing a great job. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D. Teter

customer_reviews.title: Second jar I’ve bought because of great results
customer_reviews.text: This is the second jar of this I have bought. I have had great results with it.. I use it both morning and night along with the ROC exfoliation washing disks. If you are not used to retinol products that exfoliate, you may want to use it once a day to test and see how your skin reacts to it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs and moisturizes well
customer_reviews.text: This cream is the perfect weight and absorbs easily into my skin. Plus, it moisturizes very well. Really like it. I never see the change in wrinkles any of these creams promise.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wright

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware... this is not roc!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item came with the protective seal missing and , despite the reviews that warned this was not a genuine roc product, I bought it anyway.. and learned my lesson the hard way. As soon as I opened the jar and saw there was no seal and smelled the lotion, whatever it is, knew this was not roc. I’ve used it for years and this is a fake. Absolute waste.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer and Hydrator
customer_reviews.text: RoC Retinol Correxion Max Daily Hydration cream leaves your face feeling fully moisturized, without a greasy feel or left over residue. Once you start using your face never feels dry. This is my third purchase of this cream and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Happyday81

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about a month and I didn't particularly feel like it helped. My dermatologist recommended it so I was very helpful. I have used a few different products similar to this one and I would say this one was just somewhere in the middle. I didn't love the smell. Maybe I haven't given it enough time. Hopefully it will show more results with a little more time.
customer_reviews.author: reganomicz

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this was the fragrance free one
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have the nighttime version too. They make my deep forhead wrinkles less obvious. However, I do not like how perfumey they are scented. I was excited they are making this unscented. Next time I'll be careful to make sure that is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Simplesandy

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like? This day cream has both retinol and hyaluronic ...
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? This day cream has both retinol and hyaluronic acid, and no aloe. (Weird, I know, but I'm allergic to aloe.) A jar lasts me a month and a half, so though it seems expensive, it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Guitar

customer_reviews.title: It’s Very expensive
customer_reviews.text: I looked Ninety 90 before I started using this and one week later I look 85
customer_reviews.author: Bob L Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing it is!
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well, it does exactly what it says it will. Word to the wise when using it, put on just a little bit, because it will leave a moist feel to the face, almost oily. I know it's an intense moisturizer, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: OMG, wow, what a difference after 2 weeks. Very strong and if you have sensitive skin like I do, the every other day works great until your skin is used to it. Has a funny smell, but will go away after a while. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product enhanced my complexion, gave it a smooth appearance, took away that gray worn out look and the oils that buildup diminished. I use this with the cleaning pads and the Day sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: No matter what fancy product i buy i always return to Roc. There is nothing better than this product. Careful after exfoliating it burns a little more than others. I love anything ROC
customer_reviews.author: eva gayton

customer_reviews.title: RoC retinol
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a difference in the overall look of my face since using RoC. Lines around my eyes are less noticeable; dark spots have faded but are not completely gone (but I didn't expect them to be). Good texture, initially slight burning when use but after 3 days of use (moisturize over), felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time that I have used this particular product. my skin is soft I’m 77 years old and I’m told that I look like I’m 55 or 60 so I am very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.author: Am😊Susan vellone

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth, hope it’s effective
customer_reviews.text: The product smells fine and goes on smooth. I’ve had no reactions to it. I haven’t noticed any changes since using it, so not sure if it’s worth the cost, but it seems to be a decent lotion at least.
customer_reviews.author: Ancora Imparo

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed . Used
customer_reviews.text: Box not sealed and product had no sanitary cover when you take the cap off. I’ve used this exact product for years and there is always a cover under the lid . It has been used .
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: ok product, but a generic product will work just as well
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t dislike this product; it just didn’t wow me in any way, for the price. Several of my generic brand, non-retinol products at half the price beat this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love the results
customer_reviews.text: This cream absorbs well, isn't greasy and my skin seems softer - I've had compliments on my skin which is a new thing for me. Deducted one star as fragrance is too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Product looks used.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed about the condition of the product. It looks like it has been used or is very old. The cream smells good, but after opening the jar, the content is smeared all over the inside of the lid. Inside the jar the cream has deep indentations. When the jar is turned upside down the content is solid enough that it does not run out. So how did it get spilled all over the lid? I am unable to get the picture from my phone to this page.
customer_reviews.author: Heidrun Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great results.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Roc. Excellent product that produces results. I’m 65 and have used for many years. Diminished wrinkles, smoothed skin. I use every other day as it does cause me mild irritation if used too frequently.
customer_reviews.author: lesa l

customer_reviews.title: Too greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this. The cream is very greasy. I have never used this brand. I should have read the ingredients before I bought it. It may work for others, but I felt it was greasy and didn’t soak in to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Terese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cream
customer_reviews.text: Love it saw it on the news as a great alternative to plastic surgery. It really works. I had wrinkles on my forehead and now they’re gone!
customer_reviews.author: Angela & Robert Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream after suffering from acne this has been the only cream that doesn’t make me breakout
customer_reviews.author: Francis Ruz

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used all sorts of moisturizers over the years. This works just as well as the fancy department store brands, for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: flyntiggr

customer_reviews.title: RoC skin care.
customer_reviews.text: I love the entire line of RoC skin care products. Every now and then, I try a new product, but, I always go back to RoC.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Does not have SPF
customer_reviews.text: I like this lotion. It is very hydrating. I just didn't realize that it does not contain SPF, so now I use it at night only.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal protected?
customer_reviews.text: Does this come with a safety seal after you open lid? Mine did not & im concerned about using it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good .. honestly compare to equate version and the equate works as good for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: RoC products are 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this brand. Love the resurfacing disks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beat moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer! I have been using this for years and I will never use anything else. I am in my late 40’s and have barely any wrinkles. This really does work!
customer_reviews.author: Shaller

customer_reviews.title: Spend less and get the same results!
customer_reviews.text: I was spending $80 + on a moisturizer..this works just as well for almost a third of the price. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Milana

customer_reviews.title: Light but rich moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’m not so sure about the style question but it smells very nice and light and my skin absorbed it very quickly! I like it very very
customer_reviews.author: Roxana L Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream! Was recommended to me by my doctor after I started getting basal cells on my face from sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli vanderwerf

customer_reviews.title: Good product - doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Love this face lotion but there is not enough product. The jar is thick giving you the impression it would hold a lot from the outside but you realize how mall the inside area is once you open the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for myself, and i love it. I use it at night before i go to sleep and in Am before I put my makeup. My face feels so soft and nourished.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is terrible! If it was borderline okay smelling I would have used it, but to smell that all day is not worth it 😔
customer_reviews.author: Kristiana  Vicchy

customer_reviews.title: Roc retinol correxion cream
customer_reviews.text: Does it work? Probably not! But I do like the way my skin feels so I’ll keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky stuff on bottom of jar
customer_reviews.text: Just a question - there is some sticky stuff on the bottom of the jar, stronger than Museum Wax. Was it for shipping within the box to keep the jar from moving? The sticky stuff on the bottom is proving hard to remove, it sticks to the shelf of my cabinet. Just curious if the sticky stuff is applied on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Scheel

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a great moisturizer. No burning sensation but I think it tingles and a little itchy. And it feels like it makes my face plump.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Dee

customer_reviews.title: Feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean, non greasy feel. Really seems to even out facial color and tones.
customer_reviews.author: Dana B.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Facial Cream-Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very very sensitive skin but this product not only smelled pleasant but worked so well to make my skin look young and supple. I got so many complements on my skin complexion!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ROC Retinol Correxion Max Daily
customer_reviews.text: I read about this in a magazine and decided to give it a try. Not sure yet if I look 10 years younger.
customer_reviews.author: linsteele

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good results
customer_reviews.text: This cream was recommended by my dermatologist. I have dry and sometimes irritated skin on my forehead. I have tried different expensive creams, but this one is doing a much better job of clearing my skin. It is easy to apply and provides a good base for my makeup. I plan to continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Scent too strong
customer_reviews.text: Smells like strong perfume. Scent is so strong it gives me a headache
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: This cream is thick and rich Its moisturizing and firming Quick to apply and finish morning routine It’s scented I prefer unscented but not a big deal Nice product great price and not small for $10
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I have so far loved this cream
customer_reviews.text: I have so far loved this cream. Makes the skin feel really soft. I am a new beginner so I can not say if its taken age lines out yet, but I love the feel it leaves on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizer. I have very sensitive skin and it is perfect. I wish it helped reduce wrinkles better but overall, it prevents new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Spugh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Reaction
customer_reviews.text: Used this cream and could't figure out what happened to my face. it made my face all red and dry and it was painful stopped using it and now its all gone the rash be aware if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gm

customer_reviews.title: Creamy texture
customer_reviews.text: I like the creamy texture and I think I see an improvement in my deeper wrinkles..
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rush

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it moisturizes , however , it is too greasy to use during the day and the smell isn’t strong, but smells like chemicals. I don’t think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Another great Roc product.
customer_reviews.text: Roc products never disappoint. Does a perfect job of night moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: barbara p.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The face cream is really not moisturizing nor does it decrease the wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: fine for price
customer_reviews.text: Feels good. Soaks in well. Not super retinol/fading, but some.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Love my Rocs
customer_reviews.text: Roc is one of my favorite makers of face products. This new cream was otherwise difficult to find in stores. It is creamy and light at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: carole jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Product Not Sealed and Heavy Odor
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I opened the box for this product. It had obviously been tampered with. There was no seal on the top of the jar, and the cream was partially out in the box. It has an awful smell that lasts for a long time. I will not purchase this product from Amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No reaction and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Been using 2 weeks, I’m usually very sensitive to Retinol but I used every other day like the package suggested. I love this stuff, my face seems smoother and no reaction to the Retinol!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Standlee

product_meta.title: RoC Retinol Correxion Max Daily Hydration Anti-Aging Crème with Hyaluronic Acid, 1.7 Ounces
product_meta.description: Color:BasicRoC Retinol Correxion Max daily hydration creme, rejuvenating formula reveals radiant, smoother-looking skin after just one week.Clinically proven to visibly reduce wrinkles in one week. Smooths the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots. RoC Technology ensures formula will not lose its effectiveness in the jar. Oil-free and non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores.
feature_bullets: WRINKLE TREATMENT & HYDRATION CREAM: Reveal smoother looking skin & deeply hydrate for 24 hours. This intensive anti-wrinkle treatment combines age fighting Roc Retinol & hydrating hyaluronic acid. Gentle enough for daily use.

PROVEN RESULTS: With daily use, this retinol moisturizer is clinically proven to visibly reduce wrinkles in 1 week & will gradually reduce signs of dark spots & deep wrinkles with continued use over 8 weeks. Oil-free. Non-comedogenic.
ANTI-AGING FORMULAS: Whether you're looking for a solution for deep wrinkles, fine lines, dark circles, crow's feet, uneven skin tone or dry skin, we have an anti-aging formula that's right for you.
SCIENCE & BEAUTY: We produce a wide array of skin care products & treatments including moisturizers, cleansers, serums, skin tone & wrinkle regimens & creams for eyes, neck, décolleté & much more!

SKIN CARE INNOVATION: Our products are recognized by beauty industry leaders & dermatologists for their best-in-class effectiveness. We continue to research & innovate new formulas for healthier skin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,600 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
